text: Jonathan Marc Bairstow is a cricketer that was born in England. He was born on September 26, 1989. He currently plays for the England cricket team. Jonathan is known as a right hand Wicket-keeper-batter. This role is on the defensive side as the Wicket-keeper-batter tries to stop anyone from scoring a goal. == References == == Other websites == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Bradford
title: Jonny Bairstow
